game

Class bag

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.bag

  • public class bag
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Cai & Lee this class create the bag when player starts the game, and the initial value of each items in the bag is 0.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      bag()
      Constructor Create a bag, if one of the heroes are thief, the number of maps will be 100 in the bag, which is the special ability of thief.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string of items in the bags.

      • getMap

        public int getMap()
        Returns:
        the number of maps. Hero will get the map and know the destination of one of 5 places(home base, shop,, power up den, hospital and villains lair )

      • getHpPlus25

        public int getHpPlus25()
        Returns:
        the number of hero HP plus 25,which is a type of healing items and increase 25 HP. However HP must still less than or equal the initial number of HP.

      • getHpPlus50

        public int getHpPlus50()
        Returns:
        the number of hero HP plus 50,which is a type of healing items and increase 50 HP. However HP must still less than or equal the initial number of HP.

      • getHpPlus100

        public int getHpPlus100()
        Returns:
        the number of hero HP plus 100,which is a type of healing items and increase 100 HP. However HP must still less than or equal the initial number of HP.

      • getEscapeCard

        public int getEscapeCard()
        Returns:
        the number of escape cards, which is a type of power up items and hero can escape for each fight.

      • getRecRate

        public int getRecRate()
        Returns:
        the number of recovering rate plus, which is a type of power up items and will increase the recovering of heroes.

      • getDamagePlus

        public int getDamagePlus()
        Returns:
        the number of damage plus, which is a type of power up items and will increase the damage of heroes.
